reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well, with one noting it hits at the knee, and appreciate its style for both work and after-work occasions. They describe it as comfortable, nice quality, and flattering, with one mentioning it's perfect for curvy girls. The fabric receives mixed feedback - while many find it soft, one customer describes it as a cheap feeling polyester blend material. The length is also mixed, with some appreciating the above-knee length while others find the sleeves too long. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering dress and comfortable
items.body: Nice, flattering fit. I did shorten it 2 inches and I took up the sleeves too. Read more
items.author: Evelyn Of FL

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute & Sexy Dress
items.body: I just tried the dress on. I love the fabric and the light weight fabric because it’s lightweight. The length is right below the knee, so that’s perfect. The sleeves are perfect length. The shoulder seems are perfect. The neck line is perfect. The is darker than the photo so I’m disappointed with the color. The biggest disappointment is the waistline because it’s right below the bustline. I’m long waisted so the waistline on dress is about 2” above my waistline because I’m long waisted. But I need to lose a few inches around my waist. I’m going to try another undergarment that might be tighter to determine if I will keep the dress or return it. Read more
items.author: Judith D.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Dress
items.body: Very cute and fit great Read more
items.author: Barbara Bober

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars This is an ADEQUATE dress.
items.body: Yes, I know, damning with faint praise. - the fabric is soft but sooooo blah. - the fit is... fine. That thick band above the waist is too thick. Instead of making me look slimmer, I felt it drew the eye right to that area. - It's more casual that I expected. Maybe it was the fabric, or because it was a solid, but it looked like basic t'shirt material. I'd have to really "jack it up" to make it dressy enough for an evening event Read more
items.author: Clearlyclaire

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant and comfortable
items.body: Perfect for what I wanted/needed Read more
items.author: Ashley Harstine

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice dress!
items.body: Very nice dress! For work, dinner out or holiday. Happy with it! Read more
items.author: No

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great party dress.
items.body: Perfect Dress. True fit. I like the material very wrinkle free great for travel. Read more
items.author: martin

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great plus sized dress
items.body: I was looking for something to wear for my son's upcoming high school graduation. This dress is lightweight with long sleeves, perfect for Oklahoma's May weather. The length comes just above my knees. The sleeves end right at my wrist. The top fits my chest perfectly. The dress is much brighter than I thought it would be, but that isn't anything to complain about. There is a little stretch so if I do gain weight, it will still fit. Read more
items.author: SpiderLizz

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A Navy Blue, Sketch White Black, A Dark Green, A Purple Gray, White Flower Navy, 01 Black, 02 Red, White Flower Black, Sugar Pink, 03 Wine Red, A Royal Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
